Header.title: Supply Chain Management System
Header.paragraph: Supply chain management (SCM) is management of the flow of goods, data, and finances related to a product or service, from the procurement of raw materials to the delivery of the product at its final destination.

About.paragraph: Every organization, whether big or small, has challenges to overcome and manage the information of product, customer, order, delivery, and shipment. Every supply chain management system has different customer needs, therefore we design exclusive employee management systems that are adapted to your managerial requirements. This is designed to assist in strategic planning and will help you ensure that your organization is equipped with the right level of information and details for your future goals.

Services.name: Manage Inventory
Services.text: Provide you with data to manage assets and meet record throughout the life cycle of each asset.

Services.name: Quotations
Services.text: Admin can access detailed information about the products and services.

Services.name: Invoices
Services.text: Admin can generate  and manage invoices for products delivered based on payment terms.

Services.name: Excel convertor
Services.text: Users can easily get detailed product info in form of excel sheet with just one click.

Services.name: WhatsApp Sharing
Services.text: Enables user to get reports in form of excel sheet on Whatsapp.

Services.name: E-Mail Sharing
Services.text: Enables user to get reports in form of excel sheet on email.

Features.title: Manage Data
Features.text: Collecting and using data securely, efficiently, and cost effectively.

Features.title: Visualize
Features.text: Visualize data in Excel formats and filter data easily.

Features.title: Cross Platform
Features.text: Send Data to multiple Platforms like WhatsApp and Telegram.

Features.title: Usability
Features.text: Extensive and Flexible for Supply Chain Architecture.
